$description:
| What does this do? | Ensure DLP policies are enabled that will allow sensitive data in Exchange Online and SharePoint Online to be detected or blocked |
| Why should you use this? | Ensures that at least one DLP policy is active within the tenant. |
| What is the end-user impact? | Users will need to use organizationally approved methods to share sensitive data. |
| Learn more | [Learn about DLP](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compliance/dlp-learn-about-dlp?view=o365-worldwide) |
$friendlyName: Baseline - Default DLP Policy for Office 365
